name: Tron: Cykl Swietlny
overview: Tron: Cykl Świetlny is a side scrolling 'Light Cycle' game for one to two players. The game allows to play against computer or other human player on a split-screen. Each player drives a futuristic vehicle around the game board leaving a solid trail behind them. The main purpose of the game is to cause another player to crash into the trails or the edge of the game area. Both players have eight vehicles at the start. The game ends when one of the players looses all his vehicles. The players receive the points for driving on the board. After each crash of the opponent the player receives extra 100 points. The winner is the player who accumulates more points. At the top of the screen is a map showing the entire game board.
